refnamediv.refpurpose: add titles on a graphics window

listitem.para: Starting from Scilab 5.2, it is possible to write LaTeX or MathML expression.

a sequence of statements key1=value1, key2=value2
,... where keys may be boxed (see below). In this case, the order has no special meaning.
an integer value. If it is 1, a box is drawn around each title.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: xtitle add titles on a 2D or 3D plot. title is the general title and x_label, y_label and z_label are the titles on the three axis. If the arguments are matrices, each line of the matrices is displayed on a different line.
Enter the command xtitle() to see a demo.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.scilab:image: plot3d() ; xtitle( 'My surface is blue', 'X axis', 'Y axis', 'Z axis' ) ;
